mapper.select: SELECT ID , CONTENT , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE
SELECT ID , CONTENT , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE ( ID , CONTENT , CREATE_USER , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( "CQA7WTJG"."ISEQ$$_111546".nextval , #{content} , #{createUser} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , '' , '' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CQA7WTJG.SAMPLE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
